title: What U2 songs feature The Edge's best guitar playing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Edge is such an amazing guitar player and has such a unique style, while you can find some great guitar solos like the one In The Fly and Until the End of the World, the infinite guitar in With or Without you is something back in the day was very unusual. My personal favorite is Ultraviolet (Light my way), if you listen carefully, the guitar is just amazing, is a mix of rhythm melody that reflects the soul of that song.

Gloria from October. It was their live opening song for years and features some great use of octaves and echoes. The Guitar fills the space in the song and compliments the vocals. This was from the days U2 were taken seriously as a band; a time that is now long past.
